scripts.build: npm run generate && tsc && npm run docs
scripts.generate: npm run generate:types && npm run generate:schemas
scripts.generate:types: openapi-typescript openapi/core-service.yaml -o src/generated/core-service.ts && openapi-typescript openapi/message-service.yaml -o src/generated/message-service.ts && openapi-typescript openapi/user-service.yaml -o src/generated/user-service.ts
scripts.docs: npm run docs:core && npm run docs:message && npm run docs:user && npm run docs:index
